title: Norms vs Ranked
body:
So I can go more than 3:1 KDA in normal games and win like crazy and do really well, but when it comes to ranked games, which should be around the same skill level as my MMR in both would be consistent or within a reasonable range, I get nothing but loss streaks followed by win streaks and average performances.

Anybody got any insight to offer?

Oh and just throwing up my latest match for e-peen points.

[Just a casually awesome match](http://i443.photobucket.com/albums/qq154/noogai131/Brilliance_zpsskoinxzj.png)

replies.body:
Because casual games are just that: Casual. People don't tryhard as much, there isn't anything on the line. Meanwhile in Ranked everyone will try their hardest to win, which not only makes the better players roll over unprepared players, but also causes worse players to tunnel vision or make bad decisions due to their nerves.

So there are many reasons as to why you'd do amazing in casual games and then lose in Ranked.

I also have this problem in ranked I do really well in norms(well sometimes depends who I'm with) and then in ranked well I'm just shit. (Don't look at my Ahri game where I went 3/0/8 against Cho'Gath that was kinda set up, as I invited a good friend to help me mid lane whilst he jungled yeah I got a lot of help)
http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/95280471/200774848?tab=overview
